title: My chest reward is stuck
body:
Hello, 

i would like ask you, why i didnt get chest for achieved S,S- or S+ by my champion. The game says, the chest is available, but it is already 3 weeks in the row what im reaching S grades and, i got nothing.

Thank you.

Best regards

replies.body: Have you already earned a chest on the champs you are playing? You can only earn one chest per champion per season.
